name: Hamid
bio: Hamid is a passionate and self-driven freelancer specializing in chatbot development, web technologies, and AI-based solutions. With a background in computer science and a deep love for automation, Hamid builds smart systems that make tasks easier for businesses and individuals alike.

projects.title: AI Customer Support Bot
projects.description: A smart chatbot that handles customer queries using Google Gemini and NLP techniques, trained on business-specific FAQs and documents.

projects.title: Freelance Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive and SEO-optimized website to showcase Hamid's projects, testimonials, and contact information.

projects.title: Streamlit Gemini Chatbot
projects.description: A conversational chatbot app that uses Streamlit and Google Gemini API, capable of intelligent responses using personal and general knowledge.

projects.title: Lead Capture Bot
projects.description: An automated WhatsApp bot integrated with Google Sheets to capture and manage sales leads in real-time.
